page.title: 04EATING PATTERNS SURVEY
page.content: A survey was made into eating patterns in the two age groups 7-11 (Primary) and 11-13 (Secondary). The following results were recorded. During the school week 50% of the children never have a cooked breakfast. On Saturday 39% of the 7-11s and 53% of the 11-13s have a cooked beakfast. On Sunday 40% of both groups have a cooked breakfast. During the school week the most popular time to have the main meal is in the evening. The most popular time for dinner on Sunday is between 4-6pm while 30% eat between 12 and 2pm. Eating out in a cafe or restaurant was more popular with the 7-11s while 43% of the 11-13s only eat out on special occasions. Take-away meals were popular with both groups but the 11-13s eat them more often.
